projectFeatures: The site is developed by using HTML and CSS
There is Six sections designed by CSS
This is a mobile responsive lucrative site
Can be used for finding area of different shapes. It is limited to 6 types of shape.
One can calculate area of the shapes in a single page and Result can find in a single page at a time.
This is a Colorful site that would be very attractive for kids.
School summer camp for admission in different sports.
Student can select sports to get admission. They can complete admission completely from this site.
This site can use three types of users. Student, Instructor and Admin.
tools: Tailwind CSS | DaisyUI | React | Imgbb | React Components | Vercel | Firebase | mongodb
